job.title: Software Development Engineer I
job.description: strongOur PurposebrbrstrongWe work to connect and power an inclusive digital economy that benefits everyone everywhere by making transactions safe simple smart and accessible Using secure data and networks partnerships and passion our innovations and solutions help individuals financial institutions governments and businesses realize their greatest potential Our decency quotient or DQ drives our culture and everything we do inside and outside of our company We cultivate a culture of inclusion for all employees that respects their individual strengths views and experiences We believe that our differences enable us to be a better team  one that makes better decisions drives innovation and delivers better business resultsbrbrstrongJob TitlebrbrstrongSoftware Development Engineer IbrbrstronguOverviewbrbrustrongBe part of the Operations amp Technology Fraud Products team developing new capabilities for MasterCards Decision Management Platform which serves as the core for multiple business solutions to combat fraud and validate cardholder identity Our patented Javabased platform processes billions of transactions per month in tens of milliseconds using a multitiered messageoriented approach for high performance and availabilitybrulli Would you like to develop industry leading solutions for fighting fraudlili Are you motivated by speeding business solutions to marketlili Do you want to innovate using cutting edge technologies on challenging business problemsbrliulRolebrulli Work closely with technical leads for assigned projects to assist in design and implementation taskslili Responsible for the analysis design development and delivery of software solutionslili Defines requirements for new applications and customizations adhering to standards processes and best practiceslili Be an integral part of the Agile SAFe discover and elaboration sessions Perform requirements and design reviews peer code reviews and PCI security reviews to ensure compliance with MasterCard standardsbrliulstronguAll About Youbrustrongulli Must be highenergy detailoriented proactive and have the ability to function under pressure in an independent environmentlili Must provide the necessary skills to have a high degree of initiative and selfmotivation to drive resultslili Possesses strong communication skills  both verbal and written  and strong relationship collaborative skills and organizational skillslili Willingness and ability to learn and take on challenging opportunities and to work as a member of matrix based diverse and geographically distributed project teamlili Knowledge of software development processes including agile processes and test driven developmentbrliulstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongulli May manage smaller projectinitiatives as an experienced individual contributor with specialized knowledge within assigned disciplinelili Creates documentation such as user guides and software development guides for moderatelycomplex projectslili Assists team members in the development of applications components system to system interfaces and complete software solutionslili Significant code development code review and daytoday support dutiesbrliulstronguEssential Skills Requiredbrustrongulli At least four year degree in a related field or certifications and comparable experiencelili Fundamental Knowledge and Exposure to multiple types of codinglili JavaJEElili Linux shell scriptinglili Oracle amp PLSQLlili IDE such as JBoss Developer StudioIntelliJlili Spring Framework including Spring BootbrliulDue to COVID19 most of our employees are working from home Weve implemented a virtual hiring process and continue to interview candidates by phone or video and are onboarding new hires remotely We value the safety of each member of our community because we know were all in this togetherbrbremMastercard is an inclusive Equal Employment Opportunity employer that considers applicants without regard to
